text: Hi Harpalsinh! Try using the contact's external object id when associating it to a deal via the eCommerce Bridge API

Hi!
Does anyone know if one can use a “fallback image” on products that doesnt have a “line_item.ip__ecomm_bridge__product_image” in a abandoned cart e-mail? Is this something we have to do/push from the integrated webshop or can we fix it inside HubSpot?
